entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SIMD multiplication by scalar UInt64 can produce incorrect results on Arm64 #106838
    9.0.0
  • App Exception/Crashes Due to Windows Update #106829
  • Globalization Invariant Mode string compare issue #106828
  • Inconsistent validation behavior in TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime between Windows/Linux #106826
  • DocComment XML not shipping in Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref 9.0.100-rc1 #106825
  • Performance Fundamental: Net 8 -> Net 9 Manual Comparison Report #106824
  • [mono] `Unsafe.[Write/Read]Unaligned` doesn't unroll 64B blocks #106822
    10.0.0
  • Disallow nonexistent DateTime creation #106821
  • [android][size] Mono Android sample app size regression on 07/08/2024 ~105kB #106818
  • Test failure for Sve.GatherVectorUInt32WithByteOffsetsZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #106815
  • [Mono JIT] common_call_trampoline SIGSEGV when invoking native function pointer #106811
  • CMS Unable to Add Data to UnsignedAttributes Post-Signing in .NET Framework 4.8 #106808
  • [browser][mt] Bump SignalR WBT to net10 #106807
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Have AllowedValuesAttribute and DeniedValuesAttribute support case-insensitive strings #106806
  • Document support for released app diagnostics with NativeAOT on iOS #106799
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Apple mobile runtime tests can't load BigArray_32_1 in ClassLoader tests, the size is too big. #106797
    10.0.0
  • Trim analyzer misses base constructors with trim annotations #106796
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure: GC/LargeMemory/Regressions/largearraytest/largearraytest.sh #100382
    9.0.0
  • Why do we have to have a lock on Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables? #106810
  • OpenSslNamedKeysTests.ProvidersNotSupported_ThrowsPlatformNotSupported test failure #106794
  • Use of certain GameKit APIs cause crash when running an iOS app on Mac #102964
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs 8.0.0 depends on vulnerable System.Formats.Asn1 8.0.0 #106834
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `Avx512DQ.VL.Range` #106610
    9.0.0
  • Illegal memory double mapping on Apple Silicon using Rosseta emulation #106819
  • nativeaot/SmokeTests/Exceptions failing with `Assertion failed: (n_heaps <= heap_number) || !gc_t_join.joined()` #103839
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfigTester/TestConfigTester.cmd #106602
  • [API Proposal]: File abstraction #106786
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - In the importer, always `ConvertToMask` on SVE APIs that require a mask. #104836
    10.0.0
  • Question about inconsistent code generation while using "foreach" and "List<T>" #106816
  • [mono][size][Perf] iOS and Android size regression on 8/9/2024 8:00:01 AM #106265
    9.0.0
  • [.NET 8][iOS] AOT compiler exited with code 134 #94841
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Wrong encoding for embedded broadcast #106355
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] H3_FRAME_UNEXPECTED in stress tests #87559
    9.0.0
  • [HttpStress] `H3_REQUEST_INCOMPLETE` on Linux #99959
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] [HttpStress] QuicException: Stream aborted by peer (258) in `(POST Duplex | PUT) Slow` #100534
    9.0.0
  • Linux: RBAC claims resolution fails if user has group with brackets in name #101726
  • [iOS/tvOS][fullAOT-llvm] Failures inside System.Runtime BigInteger tests #106256
  • [iOS/tvOS] BigInteger tests running out-of-memory #105753
    Future
  • [Wasi]Wasm export functions with name space cannot be invoked correctly #106310
    10.0.0
  • Xcode 16-beta compilation error: non-private labels cannot appear between .cfi_startproc / .cfi_endproc pairs #104105
    9.0.0
  • Httpwebrequest Cause program crash in runtime 8.0.5,Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter #106522
  • Runtime net8.0+ StackExchange.Redis.RedisTimeoutException error rate grows rapidly after upgrading target framework from .net 6 to 8.0 #102312
  • [API Proposal]: AsnWriter Encode with callback #75759
    10.0.0
  • membarrier(REGISTER_PRIVATE_EXPEDITED) waits through an unnecessary RCU grace period during Linux process startup #106722

PullRequests

Created

  • SuperPMI: ASPNET Collection job #106844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix trimming for DiagnosticSource #106842
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [release/8.0-staging] Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #106841
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • Ensure that Arm64 correctly handles multiplication of simd by a 64-bit scalar #106839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] inflate function pointer types; hang indirect call wrappers on the <Module> #106837
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move locks only needed for `AppDomain` off of `BaseDomain` #106833
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add tests for assigning dataflow values to generic parameters through MakeGenericType #106832
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Enable CommittedUsage event for segments #106831
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that constant folding of bitwise operations for float/double are bitwise #106830
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide support for alternative rounding modes for division and remainder of division #106795
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Sys.RT.Caching.MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #106221
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 8.0.10
  • Exclude non windows platform for the large array test #106840
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Parallelize superpmi-diffs pipeline per collection #106759
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Xml serializer test updates prep for reflection work #104173
    area-Serialization
  • [release/9.0] pal init: Init membarrier() before first thread to improve start time #106836
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Avoid signed overflow in DBG_FlushInstructionCache #106823
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix trimming for DiagnosticSource #106680
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disabled stackoverflow tests with largeframe for RISCV64 #106383
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Relax PNSE expectation for OSSL providers on Apple platforms #106804
    area-System.Security
  • Fix MD5 failures on Azure Linux in System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs #106835
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [release/9.0] Don't define HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS on mono #106801
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory
  • Fix follow-up feedback from the downlevel LibraryImportGenerator split #106827
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix: SafeBerHandle and HGlobalMemHandle leaks in BerConverter #106316
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Don't define HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS on mono #106764
    area-System.Memory
  • [release/9.0] Fix infinite loop in genCreateAddrMode #106766
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • pal init: Init membarrier() before first thread to improve start time #106724
    tenet-performance, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Add Non-Faulting behaviour for Sve.LoadVector*NonFaulting*() #106768
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that constant folding of bitwise operations for float/double are bitwise #106711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix embedded broadcasts for MaybeIMM instructions #106802
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add missing return mono_type_to_load_membase #106798
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update Azure Linux tag names #106778
    needs-area-label
  • Remove Helper Method Frames from all `StubHelpers` #106793
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add Base64Url fuzzer #106509
    area-System.Buffers
  • ARM64-SVE: Always convert to mask for mask APIs #106690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #106773
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0] Fix compilation of runtime with Xcode 16 #106800
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenerateResolveStub #106562
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix embedded broadcasts for MaybeIMM instructions #106780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix for DATAS assert during initialization stage #106752
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete check for old PowerPC Rosetta from CoreCLR PAL #106763
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add missing .alt_entry to CoreCLR *_FakeProlog methods #106744
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Add NativeRuntimeEventSource metadata to NativeAot CoreLib #106713
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading
  • Add callback-based Encode to AsnWriter #106728
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Preserve range check for HW intrinsics with non-const/out-of-range immediates #106765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2522175 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Emitting more push instructions based on the push size #106516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the rest of the SimdAsHWIntrinsic support #106594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove jit helpers for writing IBC log data #106791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use STLUR with 0 offset #106760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Use OpenSSL 3's KBKDF for SP800-108 if it is available #106779
    area-System.Security
  • Remove ArrayClass::m_ElementType - get type from the type handle on MethodTable #106787
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [mono][mini] Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange intrinsics for small types and enums #106660
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable all AVX-512 ISA's in Crossgen2 and ILC When Supported #106792
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use FeatureSwitchDefinition in a few places #106564
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106700
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106701
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.10
  • Fix a case in MethodImpl overriding which wasn't handled as expected in ilc.exe for native aot #106716
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix stack overflow in the configuration source gen #106668
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix bug in validating unused bits #106771
    area-System.Memory
  • [release/9.0] Fix invalid handle bug happening when `TypeBuilder` type used in exception catch clause #106704
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix infinite loop in genCreateAddrMode #106767
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Set GC metrics to zero prior to first GC #106734
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Make SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenKeyFromProvider throw PNSE on OSSL less than 3.0 #106753
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement IEnumerator<T> on ref struct enumerators #106309
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update a few code paths to ensure the trimmer can do its job #106777
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr

entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deconstruct works inconsistently in patterns and in deconstruction into tuple #74852

Closed

  • Inheritance margin doesn't work well with screen scaling #74035
    17.12
  • CS9203 False Positive #74854

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix copilot options default value handling #74867
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix handling default copilot option values #74866
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use InterceptorsNamespaces feature name instead of InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces #74865
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update Code Clean up Fixer to Support Async Code Cleanup on Save #74861
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Standardize on NET pre-proc symbol #74859
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #74848
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Expose disposing capability on IAssemblyLoaderInternal #74845
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report nullable ctor warnings for struct primary constructors #74844
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • test for rename exclusion #74843
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Skip ValidateVisualBasicTemplateProjects failing on CI due to AVE #74831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix error closing source link documents in VSCode #74862
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Adds MicrosoftIdentityModelJsonWebTokensVersion to Versions.prop #74864
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Always make project changes using the 'batch scope' approach to reduce duplication. #74863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Hook up file watchers for analyzer references #74858
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move type to its own file #74857
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Set ScaleFactor for inheritance margin context menu #74849
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74850
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74847
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74846
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74740
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74825
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, VSCode

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74869
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update dartlab pipeline #74811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Field-backed properties: update uses of IsAutoProperty #74798
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize usage of `Stack<T>` in SyntaxNavigator #74813
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: don't provide snippets when dotting of a type name #74841
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support rename and resolve multiple symbols in one solution snapshot #63588
  • Allow suppressing nullability warnings in more ref scenarios #74498
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Allow ref enumerators in async/iterator methods #74800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Workaround failure to declare GenerateManifests as a dependency of _CopyResolvedFilesToPublishPreserveNewest #74842
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Offer a way to force browsers to reload bundle.scp.css files #57472
  • Perf regression: endpoint #57468
  • Perf improvement: https #57467
  • Update to .NET 10 #57461
    10.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Build acceleration breaks blazor web apps. #57460
    9.0-rc2
  • Cookie auth (with identity) for MAUI Blazor (BlazorWebView) - iOS and Android? #57456
  • Unable to achieve eventcallback from reusable razor component in blazor webassembly #57457
  • [Blazor] Enable custom text in the new (.Net 9.0) reconnect dialog #57453
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Deprecating `area-web-frameworks` label #57452

Closed

  • Naming inconsistency on `ISkipStatusCodePagesMetadata` feature #57382
  • Test failure: no exception in ResultsOfTResult1TResult2_Throws_InvalidOperationException_WhenResultIsNull #57360
    10.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: endpoint, updates #57455
  • InputSelect Component has potentially a bug. On EditForm submit (Static SSR), it causes InputText field not to databind to the model. #57350
    9.0-rc2
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/9.0-rc1` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #57341
  • NavigationManager in SSR navigates from https to http #57454
  • Smarter IResponse content types #55882
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, plaintext #57447
  • IEndpointAddressScheme (RouteValuesAddressScheme) FindEndpoints returns incorrect Endpoint in ASP.NET Core MVC (both 6 and 7) #51549

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3e3b44c` to `ff233bd` #57475
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3e3b44c` to `ff233bd` #57474
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Fix StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #57473
    area-networking
  • Unquarantine Frame_MultipleStreams_RequestsNotFinished_DefaultMaxStreamsPerConnection_EnhanceYourCalmAfterDoubleMaxStreams #57471
    area-networking
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix race in RST_STREAM_IncompleteRequest_AdditionalWindowUpdateFrame_ConnectionAborted #57450
    area-networking

Merged

  • Add README to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation package #54508
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57469
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • fix: Correct interface filename to match interface name for `ISkipStatusCodePagesMetadata` #57441
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix ResultsOfTGenerated tests #57465
    area-minimal, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Add references to new 9.0 branches in .yml files #57463
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 9.0-rc2

Updated

  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal, area-networking
  • Upgrade xunit version to 2.9.0 #57303
    area-infrastructure
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal

PullRequests

Updated

  • Enable new exception handling in .NET 9 SOS testing #4817

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Items in CollectionView take up large vertical space in iOS #24392
  • Obsolete Compatibility.Layout #24386
    9.0-rc1
  • Application works in Debug build but crashes in Release build when binding ImmutableArray to ItemsSource with x:Static #24384
  • Android app doesn't build in Release mode (Mono Ahead of Time compiler) #24380
  • `CollectionView` throws `NRE` when `ItemTemplate` uses a `ViewCell` as parent #24379
  • didReceiveIncomingPushWithPayload does not work with closed or background application #24374
  • Add support for `TextAlignment.Justify` #24373
    9.0-rc1
  • Picker's SelectedItem in CollectionView DataTemplate not working #24369

Closed

  • MAUI Breaks Cohesive Design Principle #24383
  • WebAuthenticator on Windows throws unhelpful errors #23616
  • [Bug] [Android] Inconsistent toolbar text color on interaction. #10660
    Backlog
  • Android project ToolbarItem font color exception after changing available state #22937
    Backlog
  • TouchEffect cancels all gesture recognizers on iOS (at least) #24381
  • Crash on ios when open new screen or navigate back to it #24032
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Can't run the test App from the MAUI introduction project #24375
  • Span text-decoration is incorrect whereas the Label behaves properly #23488
    Backlog
  • A double click (only clicked event defined) on a MenuFlyoutItem adds multiple pages #16276
  • premissions .Net Maui c# android do not work #24179
  • The icon on MacOS does not change in the application. #23816
  • Exception on MAUI after Update #24185
  • Adding IconImageSource to the contentpage in xaml crashes in .NET MAUI for IOS #24182
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection gives exception and prevents the app from running #24186
  • App requesting NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription #19918
  • .NET 8.0 iOS app crashes on lauch since updating to iOS 18.3 beta #23753

PullRequests

Created

  • Use newer default backup rules for android #24391
  • [ci] Build public #24388
  • Add Styleable Element to simplify styling for external libraries #24387
  • Add support for `TextAlignment.Justify` - fix #24376
    community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24372
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨

Merged

  • Merge SR8 into main #24382
  • Remove non-functioning code and instead throw a more helpful platform-not-supported error #23617
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix ToolbarItem font color issue after changing available state. #24065
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [net9.0] Update packages rc1 #24371
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove excessive ListView API doc #24327
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr8] Backport maestro and artifact drop infra improvements from net9.0 #24378
  • Fix "XamlC error: key was not present in the dictionary" when `OnIdiom` is used in… #24367
  • [Windows] Fix Span Foreground property #24063
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9

Updated

  • Introduce WindowProvider and add to Scoped ServiceProvider #24081
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fix border lagging and unwanted animations on iOS #24360
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Fix API23 Core device tests #24128
    testing-green-ci
  • Fixed the CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the application #24205
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for Entry SelectionLength #24064
    community ✨
  • [Android] SecureStorage: Rework logic to delete shared prefs when key is corrupt #23850
    area-essentials
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Entry clear button is not taking the color of the text. #24196
    community ✨
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24212
    community ✨
  • Obsolete Compatibility.Layout #24342
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    community ✨
  • 899474: Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨
  • Visual state change for disabled RadioButton #23471
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
  • [Testing] moved FlyoutHeaderAdaptsToMinimumHeight to appium #24294
    community ✨, testing-green-ci
  • [IOS ]Fix border has an unexpected background animation #24227
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2592.51` to `1.0.2651.64` #24329
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.5.5 to 1.5.6 #24328
    community ✨
  • [XC] Fallback to reflection-based bindings for bindings with "invalid" path #24238
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` #24355
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Join is causing to load all the field of the table #34516
  • dotnet-ef generating CompiledModels that won't build (MySQL / HasColumnType("json") / storing an array) #34515
  • Use EF 8 openjson for inserts #34512
  • Cosmos provider does not map string key when partition key is also defined #34511
    9.0.0
  • Transform multiple ORs into a single SQL IN #34507
    Backlog
  • Issue while scaffolding columns that are updated by a sequence #34505
  • Updates cannot delete navigations with shadow foreign keys in case of explicit tracking #34503
  • In a one-to-many query, if AutoInclude is configured, when querying 'many', there will be an extra 'many' in 'one' of 'many' #34502

Closed

  • Seeing 503 (Service Unavailable) from the CosmosDB Emulator | Docker Compose #34500
  • Compilation perf: consider not exhaustively including all query sub-nodes in hash calculation #19859
  • Compilation perf: consider caching hash codes for immutable query expression node types #19860

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34513

Merged

  • Rename some locals #34514
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode
  • (RC2) Fix ESCAPE clause for Azure Synapse. (#34463) #34510
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode
  • (RC2) Fix ESCAPE clause for Azure Synapse. (#34463) #34509
  • Use different store names for funky data tests #34506
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34504
  • (RC2) Cosmos: strip implicit casts to allow vector search over arrays #34495
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode

Updated

  • Acquire the migrations database lock in a transaction. #34489
